page.title: 06LOCAL HISTORY
page.content: The one part of West Calder everyone remembers is the Co-operative Society,who were the ones that gave an electricity generating plant and street lights to West Calder.The president of this company is Robert W.Rankine who has seen all the changes in recent times.The most important of all was shale mining and the 5 sisters,which are made of shale.Shale mining stopped about 22 years ago and to make the 5 sisters a lot of men worked very hard.The 5 sisters are really only the shale that was dug up from the mine and not used.Now in West Calder since shale mining is exhausted we use North Sea oil which started about 10 years ago.Only a couple of shale miners are left in our community but they will soon be gone.
